meanings.definition: The quality or state of being organic.
meanings.sent1: The organicities of the soil help plants grow naturally.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the organicities of this farm's produce.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the secret ingredient was the organicities of the vegetables.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork beautifully captured the organicities of nature.
meanings.sent5: The organicities of the forest were breathtaking in their complexity.

meanings.definition: The organic nature or character of something.
meanings.sent1: The organicities of the music resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent2: She admired the organicities of the handmade pottery.
meanings.sent3: The novel's plot twist revealed the hidden organicities of the protagonist.
meanings.sent4: His speech highlighted the organicities of community bonding.
meanings.sent5: The organicities of the painting brought out its true beauty.

meanings.definition: The organic elements or components of a substance.
meanings.sent1: The organicities of the recipe made it a healthy choice.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the organicities of different compounds.
meanings.sent3: The organicities of the drink gave it a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: The organicities of the skincare product were all-natural.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the organicities of food helps in making better dietary choices.
